item.title: Morgan Stanley upgrades an under-the-radar China robotics play, sees big upside
item.description: Morgan Stanley believes shares of Hesai Group could rise 22% from here.

item.title: Options traders are expecting a huge move on earnings from DoorDash. How to trade it
item.description: Mike Khouw breaks down the set-up on the food delivery tech stock into earnings next week.

item.title: Earnings playbook: Reporting season ramps up with more ‘Magnificent 7’ results this week
item.description: This coming week marks the busiest one of the second quarter corporate earnings season, and some of the world's biggest companies are on the docket.

item.title: JPMorgan downgrades American Eagle following Sydney Sweeney-inspired rally
item.description: JPMorgan forecast that shares of American Eagle Outfitters could fall 23% from their current levels.

item.title: Bernstein upgrades Charter to outperform on recovering financials, predicts more than 20% upside ahead
item.description: Bernstein analyst Laurent Yoon wrote that cable companies "are far from structurally broken."
